chapters.title: Chapter 26: The Extra Bit
chapters.info: Talene Minly, p. 499 (567)—Sitter for the Green Ajah in Tar Valon. She has golden hair, and has a statuesque air. She was friends with Seaine before the rift that formed between the Ajahs went up. She earned more punishments as a novice than any other woman in history. Quite possibly of the Black Ajah—she refused to re-swear the Three Oaths and deny being a Darkfriend.
